document_data.name: Akarav's Bay
document_data.mainbody: '''Akarav's Bay''' was the northernmost bay of [[Lake Esmel]] in [[Amn]].
document_data.Description: The bay contained Lake Esmel's largest concentration of mineral springs, which kept the waters warm and provided health benefits to those bathing within.
document_data.Geography: In addition to many springs, Akarav's Bay was fed by the [[Splendarrllur]].
document_data.History: The bay was named after a priest of [[Waukeen]] who discovered the springs and founded the first resort to take advantage of the waters,
